dmca.title: [ABUSE] Cease & Desist / DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice]
dmca.body:
Please note that the website referenced in your DMCA notice does not
reside within our network as of 3:18:43 p.m. (GMT-6) on June 28, 2006.
 
Legal Response Team
The Planet

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Tuesday, June 27, 2006 3:01 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Cease & Desist / DMCA Copyright Infringement
Notice]

Forwarding to Copyright for review.


-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Cease & Desist / DMCA Copyright Infringement
Notice
Date:         Sat, 24 Jun 2006 08:56:10 -0700 (PDT)
From:         Ron Wainscott <ron@ronwainscottphotography.com>
To:         info@synth-tec.com, support@synth-tec.com, abuse@theplanet.com
CC:         evils_bubbles@yahoo.com



Please find attached a formal DMCA notice in regards to a profile on
vampirefreaks.com using my copyrighted work without permission.
Immediate action is necessary to avoid criminal prosecution.  Ron
Wainscott Photography DOES NOT allow the use of our copyrighted images
without permission and will take whatever actions necessary to prosecute
those responsible for infringing upon our copyrights.


--
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
